original_text: After this, the Lord blessed Job more than in the beginning of his life. All these animals belonged to Job: 14,000 sheep, 6,000 camels, 1,000 pairs of oxen, and 1,000 female donkeys.
korean_text: 여호와께서 욥의 말년에 욥에게 처음보다 더 복을 주시니 그가 양 만 사천과 낙타 육천과 소 천 겨리와 암나귀 천을 두었고

sentences.original_text: After this, the Lord blessed Job
more than in the beginning of his life.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 삶의 시작보다 더 많이 축복하셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: All these animals belonged to Job:
